translation.welcome: THE BIGGEST HEALTH CONTENT GENERATION IN LATIN AMERICA IS BACK!
translation.name: Name
translation.subscription: The biggest latin american health experience
translation.text: Participate in a super week and make a change in the Health Ecosystem with us! #FISWEEK is the biggest experience available in the Latin American health sector. Here, we join in leaders, enterprises and entities with the goal of exchanging knowledge about the subjects that concern the health system. All of that in just one event, 100% online and free!

inputs.name: Name
inputs.HowDidYouHearAboutTheEvent?: How did you hear about the event?
inputs.WhichEventWouldYouLikeToAttend: Which event would you like to be part ofr?

institutional.title: Vamos transformar o universo da saúde juntos?

events.fisText: #FIS is the largest health leaders event in Latin America. It is our main product. Our objective is to discuss among the most important characters the most troublesome subjects in health. We bring matters to transform the main 10 beliefs of our organization: Industrial complex, communication, education, entrepreneurship, finance, administration, governance, innovation, assistantial models and regulation.
events.symetriaText: #SYMETRIA is the first ESG (Environmental, Social and Governance) health event in Latin America. Great Leaders of the sectors will be participating bringing in their experiences. Everything that has to do with the DNA of Iniciativa FIS will be playing a role in the event.
events.commeetsText: #COMMEETS is the event in which our greatest allies with create content
events.lyggaText: #LYGGA is to us an Education synonym which is one of the main Iniciativa FIS beliefs. With it we bring an exclusive event to dedicate Health education with major health discussions to executives and academics. The idea is to present methodologies and instruments to Digital Health, giving in updates, networking and opportunities to follow up debates with sensible subjects to the health area.

programmation.text: Os desafios de implementar políticas públicas de saúde durante uma pandemia
programmation.filterProgrammation: Pesquise por tema, participante ou evento

startups.text: BEE HIVE is the moment in which the health Startups will have their online Pitch. Here is where the companies can take a change to present their solutions to Leaders and to the Health market.
startups.eventOnline: The event will be in person and online
startups.upload: Faça o upload do seu Deck
